LanguageData.OMC_Turret_Small.label: OMC Doom Turret
LanguageData.OMC_Turret_Small.description: An automatic OMC Auto Shotgun-equipped turret. Requires obsidia ammo kit as fuel. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.OMC_Turret_Small.comps.CompRefuelable.fu: Shoots until run out of charges
LanguageData.OMC_Turret_Small.comps.CompRefuelable.ou: Cannot shoot: Needs obsidia ammo kit
LanguageData.OMC_Turret_SmallPowered.label: OMC Doom Powered Turret
LanguageData.OMC_Turret_SmallPowered.description: An automatic OMC Auto Shotgun-equipped turret. Requires obsidia ammo kit as fuel. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.\n\nThis turret has a built-in generator.
LanguageData.OMC_Turret_SmallPowered.comps.CompRefuel: Shoots until run out of charges
Cannot shoot: Needs obsidia ammo kit
LanguageData.OMC_TurretGun_Small.label: Doom Turret
LanguageData.OMC_TurretGun_Small.description: Reconstructed OMC Auto Shotgun for turrets. Rapid-fire and multiple-charge weapons with reduced damage.
LanguageData.OMC_TurretBullet_Small.label: doom turret blast
